entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
